law.catch_line: On or before December 1 of each year, the Commissioner and the Commission shall report to the Govern...
law.text:
On or before December 1 of each year, the Commissioner and the Commission shall report to the Governor and, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the General Assembly, on:
the number and types of appeals that have been filed by physicians under this subtitle and the outcome of the appeals; and
the number of entities that have been approved by the Commission as ratings examiners under Title 19, Subtitle 1, Part V of the Health - General Article.
